Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Match

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.Match
  • public class Match
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Match, Contains the state of the match

      • restoreCards

        public void restoreCards()
        This method replaces any stuff taken. Replace ammo tiles with new tiles from the ammo stacks. If you empty the stacks, shuffle the discard pile (including any tiles you grabbed this turn) and make new ammo stacks. Replace weapons by drawing from the weapons deck. If the deck is empty, no new weapons will appear for the rest of the game.

      • firstPlayerPlayedLastTurn

        public void firstPlayerPlayedLastTurn()
        Sets that the first player has played in the last turn
